Class Player

java.lang.Object
sk.stuba.fiit.GameObject
sk.stuba.fiit.entities.Entity
sk.stuba.fiit.entities.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable, Serializable, Cloneable, Damageable, Effectable, Mortal, Tickable
public class Player extends Entity implements Damageable, Mortal, Tickable, Effectable, Serializable, Cloneable
Represents a player character in the game, with properties for health, balance, weapon, and effects. The Player class allows for actions such as attacking, taking damage, healing, and handling status effects. It also includes functionality for movement, collision detection, and ticking updates.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String name, String description, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture, float size, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 position, int health, int maxHealth, int healingPerInterval, Timer timer, int balance, WeaponFactory weaponFactory)
      Creates a new player instance with the provided properties.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the player.
      description - The description of the player.
      texture - The texture to represent the player.
      size - The size of the player.
      position - The position of the player.
      health - The initial health of the player.
      maxHealth - The maximum health of the player.
      healingPerInterval - The healing amount per interval.
      timer - The healing timer.
      balance - The initial balance of the player.
      weaponFactory - The factory used to create the player's weapon.
